languages.text: "...и заключает нас в клетке цифровых обетов!" {n}Паскаль вздрагивает, словно от разряда Движущей силы. Мехадендриты возносятся над него плечами подобием стальных крыльев, а голос, льющийся из динамика вокса, обретает потустороннюю глубину и мощь.{/n} "И потому Циклу должно быть прерванным".

"...and locks us in a cage of data-vows!" {n}Pasqal shudders as if struck by the Motive Force itself. Mechadendrites rise like steel wings behind his shoulders. The voice from his vox-speaker takes on an otherworldly profundity and power:{/n} "And therefore the Cycle must be discontinued."
languages.original_text: "...и заключает нас в клетке цифровых обетов!" {n}Паскаль вздрагивает, словно от разряда Движущей силы. Мехадендриты возносятся над него плечами подобием стальных крыльев, а голос, льющийся из динамика вокса, обретает потустороннюю глубину и мощь.{/n} "И потому Циклу должно быть прерванным".

traits.locale_text: "...and locks us in a cage of data-vows!" {n}Pasqal winces, as if struck by a charge of the Motive Force. Mechadendrites rise like steel wings behind his shoulders. The voice from his vox speaker takes on an otherwordly profundity and power.{/n} "And therefore the Cycle must be discontinued."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "...and locks us in a cage of data-vows!" {n}Pasqal winces, as if struck by a charge of the Motive Force. Mechadendrites rise like steel wings behind his shoulders. The voice from his vox speaker takes on an otherwordly profundity and power.{/n} "And therefore the Cycle must be discontinued."

The voice from his vox-speaker takes on an otherworldly profundity and power.{/n} "And therefore the Cycle must be discontinued."

The voice from his vox-speaker takes on an otherworldly profundity and power.{/n} "And therefore the Cycle must be discontinued."

The voice from his vox-speaker takes on an otherworldly profundity and power:{/n} "And therefore the Cycle must be discontinued."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "...and locks us in a cage of data-vows!" {n}Pasqal shudders as if struck by the Motive Force itself. Mechadendrites rise like steel wings behind his shoulders. The voice from his vox-speaker takes on an otherworldly profundity and power:{/n} "And therefore the Cycle must be discontinued."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「…そしてデータの誓いの檻に自分たちを閉じ込めた！」{n}パスカルは動力に突き動かされたかのように、身震いする。パスカルの肩口から、鋼鉄の翼のように機械触手が持ち上がる。彼のヴォクス・スピーカーから発する声はこの世のものとは思えぬ深みと力強さを秘めている。{/n}「したがって、サイクルを止めねばならぬ」
languages.original_text: "...and locks us in a cage of data-vows!" {n}Pasqal shudders as if struck by the Motive Force itself. Mechadendrites rise like steel wings behind his shoulders. The voice from his vox-speaker takes on an otherworldly profundity and power:{/n} "And therefore the Cycle must be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: 「…そしてデータの誓いの檻に自分たちを閉じ込めた！」{n}パスカルは動力に突き動かされたかのように、身震いする。パスカルの肩口から、鋼鉄の翼のように機械触手が持ち上がる。彼のヴォクス・スピーカーから発する声はこの世のものとは思えぬ深みと力強さを秘めている。{/n}「したがって、サイクルを止めねばならぬ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “……将我们困于数字誓约的囚笼之中！”{n}帕斯卡畏缩了一下，像是被源力击中了。机械触须像钢翼一样在他的肩膀后面展开。他的音阵装置中发出的声音深厚有力，仿若来自异界。{/n}“因此，循环必须终止。”
languages.original_text: "...and locks us in a cage of data-vows!" {n}Pasqal shudders as if struck by the Motive Force itself. Mechadendrites rise like steel wings behind his shoulders. The voice from his vox-speaker takes on an otherworldly profundity and power:{/n} "And therefore the Cycle must be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: “……将我们困于数字誓约的囚笼之中！”{n}帕斯卡畏缩了一下，像是被原初动力击中了。机械触须像钢翼一样在他的肩膀后面展开。他的音阵装置中发出的声音深厚有力，仿若来自异界。{/n}“因此，循环必须终止。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « ... et nous enferme dans une cage de serments ! » {n}Pasqal laisse échapper une grimace, comme si la Force Motrice elle-même l'avait frappé. Derrière ses épaules, les mécadendrites se déploient telles des ailes d'acier. La voix qui émane de son synthétiseur-vox prend une profondeur surnaturelle.{/n} « C'est pourquoi le Cycle doit être interrompu. »
languages.original_text: "...and locks us in a cage of data-vows!" {n}Pasqal shudders as if struck by the Motive Force itself. Mechadendrites rise like steel wings behind his shoulders. The voice from his vox-speaker takes on an otherworldly profundity and power:{/n} "And therefore the Cycle must be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: « ... et nous enferme dans une cage de serments ! » {n}Pasqal laisse échapper une grimace, comme si la Force Motrice elle-même l'avait frappé. Derrière ses épaules, les mécadendrites se déploient telles des ailes d'acier. La voix qui émane de son synthétiseur-vox prend une profondeur surnaturelle.{/n} « C'est pourquoi le Cycle doit être interrompu. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «... ¡y nos encierra en una jaula de juramentos de datos!». {n}Pasqal se estremece como si le estuviese afectando la Fuerza Motriz. Las mecadendritas se alzan como alas de acero tras sus hombros. La voz de su altavoz de voco adquiere una profundidad y poder sobrenaturales.{/n} «Y, por lo tanto, es preciso interrumpir el Ciclo».
languages.original_text: "...and locks us in a cage of data-vows!" {n}Pasqal shudders as if struck by the Motive Force itself. Mechadendrites rise like steel wings behind his shoulders. The voice from his vox-speaker takes on an otherworldly profundity and power:{/n} "And therefore the Cycle must be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: «... ¡y nos encierra en una jaula de juramentos de datos!». {n}Pasqal se retuerce, como si le estuviese afectando la Fuerza Motriz. Las mecadendritas se alzan como alas de acero tras sus hombros. La voz de su altavoz de voco adquiere una profundidad y poder sobrenaturales.{/n} «Y, por lo tanto, es preciso interrumpir el Ciclo».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "... und sperrt uns in einen Käfig von Datengelübden!" {n}Pasqal schaudert, als sei er von der Antriebskraft selbst getroffen worden. Mechadendriten erheben sich hinter seinen Schultern wie stählerne Flügel. Die Stimme aus seinem Vox-Lautsprecher nimmt eine andersweltliche Tiefgründigkeit an:{/n} "Und daher darf der Zyklus nicht fortgesetzt werden."
languages.original_text: "...and locks us in a cage of data-vows!" {n}Pasqal shudders as if struck by the Motive Force itself. Mechadendrites rise like steel wings behind his shoulders. The voice from his vox-speaker takes on an otherworldly profundity and power:{/n} "And therefore the Cycle must be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: "... und sperrt uns in einen Käfig von Datengelübden!" {n}Pasqal verzieht das Gesicht, als sei er von der Antriebskraft selbst getroffen worden. Mechadendriten erheben sich hinter seinen Schultern wie stählerne Flügel. Die Stimme aus seinem Vox-Lautsprecher nimmt eine andersweltliche Tiefgründigkeit an.{/n} "Und daher darf der Zyklus nicht fortgesetzt werden."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Sonra da bizi veri yeminlerinden oluşan bir kafese kilitler!" {n}Pasqal, doğrudan Devinim Gücü'nden darbe almışçasına sarsılıyor. Omuzlarının arkasındaki mekadentritler, çelikten birer kanat gibi açılıyor. Voks hoparlöründen gelen ses, dünya dışı bir derinlik ve kudret kazanıyor.{/n} "Bundandır ki Döngü'nün süreği bozulmalı."
languages.original_text: "...and locks us in a cage of data-vows!" {n}Pasqal shudders as if struck by the Motive Force itself. Mechadendrites rise like steel wings behind his shoulders. The voice from his vox-speaker takes on an otherworldly profundity and power:{/n} "And therefore the Cycle must be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: "...Ve bizi veri yeminlerinden oluşan bir kafese kilitler!" {n}Pasqal, sanki direkt Devinim Gücü'nden darbe almışcasına sarsılıyor. Omuzlarının arkasındaki mekadentritler çelikten birer kanat gibi açılıyor. Voks hoparlöründen gelen ses, dünya dışı bir derinlik ve kudret kazanıyor:{/n} "Ve bu sebeple, Döngü'nün süreği bozulmalı."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
